About

Club activities

Regular get-together

Every Wednesday, 21:30-22:00

Training

Each of the members is divided into practice class and education class according to their skills.

  • Practice class : Practice by solving problems from Baekjoon Online Judge
  • Education class : Arrange seminar times by coordinating schedules among members, and follow basic algorithmic lectures and curricula of instructor(s)

Participating in contests

ACM-ICPC Korea Regional

This is the main contest which our club is preparing for.

  1. Online Qualification Round
  2. Daejeon Regional
  3. World Finals

Codeforces

Facebook Hacker Cup

Google Code Jam

Club Competition

[Spring] RUN Spring Contest

You compete for skills youâ€™ve honed during the club activities. Members of the club prepare for the tasks given in the contest.

[Autumn] KAIST ACM-ICPC Mock competition

We hold an ACM-ICPC mock contest for all students in KAIST every autumn semester before the regional contest. Members of the club prepare for the tasks given in the contest.
